member.name: T:Ericsson.SC.Node.Drivers.DmmType
member.summary: The instrument type of the DMM.

member.name: T:Ericsson.SC.Node.Drivers.Dmm
member.summary: Simple singleton class for making voltage measurements. Also handles switching for the Agilent34970 instrument. The class will use one of the instruments in the DmmType enumeration.

member.name: M:Ericsson.SC.Node.Drivers.Dmm.Initialize(System.String)
member.summary: Initialize the driver. Find out which instrument that is connected by querying for "*idn?"
member.exception: Unable to get ICommon interface or unknown DMM type.
member.param: The name of the driver session or the logical name.

member.name: P:Ericsson.SC.Node.Drivers.Dmm.Type
member.summary: Returns the type of the Dmm. PreCondition: Initialize must have been called.

member.name: P:Ericsson.SC.Node.Drivers.Dmm.VoltageChannel34970
member.summary: Get/Set the channel to use for measuring voltage when DmmType == Agilent34970.

member.name: M:Ericsson.SC.Node.Drivers.Dmm.SetupForVoltageMeasurement
member.summary: Configure the DMM for measuring voltage.

member.name: M:Ericsson.SC.Node.Drivers.Dmm.SetSwitch(System.Int32,Ericsson.SC.Node.Drivers.SwitchPosition,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Agilent34970 Specific. Open or close a specific channel. Close one channel exclusively and open all other channels if position == SwitchPosition.Close and exclusive == true.
member.param: If true and position == Close, close the channel and open all other channels.
